org.locationtech.geowave.core.index

Class VarintUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.locationtech.geowave.core.index.VarintUtils

  • public class VarintUtils
extends Object
    Based on Varint. Provides additional functionality to encode varints directly to ByteBuffers.

        public static int timeByteLength(long time)
        Get the byte length of a varint encoded timestamp.
        Parameters:
        time - the timestamp
        Returns:
        the number of bytes the encoded timestamp will use

      • writeTime

                             ByteBuffer buffer)
        Encode a timestamp using varint encoding.
        Parameters:
        time - the timestamp
        buffer - the ByteBuffer to write the timestamp to

      • writeTime

        public static byte[] writeTime(long time)
        Encode a timestamp using varint encoding.
        Parameters:
        time - the timestamp
        Returns:
        the timestamp as bytes

      • readTime

        public static long readTime(ByteBuffer buffer)
        Read a timestamp from a ByteBuffer that was previously encoded with writeTime(long, java.nio.ByteBuffer).
        Parameters:
        buffer - the ByteBuffer to read from
        Returns:
        the decoded timestamp

      • writeBigDecimal

        public static byte[] writeBigDecimal(BigDecimal num)
        Encode a BigDecimal as a byte[]. The structure of the byte[] is opaque, so to deserialize, use readBigDecimal(ByteBuffer)
        Parameters:
        num - The number to serialize as a ByteBuffer
        Returns:
        a byte array that represents the given BigDecimal.

      • readBigDecimal

        public static BigDecimal readBigDecimal(ByteBuffer buffer)
        Read a BigDecimal number from a ByteBuffer that was previously encoded by using writeBigDecimal(BigDecimal)
        Parameters:
        buffer - The ByteBuffer that contains the BigDecimal next in its contents.
        Returns:
        The BigDecimal that was stored in the ByteBuffer, and the ByteBuffer's position is modified past the BigDecimal.
